NSURL(NDCarbonUtilities)

Provides method for interacting with Carbon APIs.

Extends Class: NSURL
Declared In: NSURL+NDCarbonUtilities

Discussion

Methods for dealing with FSRef’s and other useful Carbon stuff.


Methods

-fileSystemPathHFSStyle

Returns a HFS style path.

-finderInfoFlags:type:creator:

Get finder info flags creator and type.

-finderLocation

Return a finder items location.

-getFSRef:

Get a FSRef.

-getFSSpec:

Get a FSSpec.

-resolveAliasFile

Resolve an alias file.

-setFinderInfoFlags:mask:type:creator:

Set finder info flags, creator and type.

-setFinderLocation:

Sets the location a finder item.

-URLByDeletingLastPathComponent

Delete last component of a url.

+URLWithFileSystemPathHFSStyle:

Alloc and intialize a NSURL.

+URLWithFSRef:

Alloc and intialize a NSURL.

fileSystemPathHFSStyle

Returns a HFS style path. 

- (NSString *)fileSystemPathHFSStyle;
Return Value

A new NSString containing a HFS style path for the same file or directory as the receiver.

Discussion

Returns a NSString containg a HFS style path (e.g. Macitosh HD:Users:) useful for display purposes.

finderInfoFlags:type:creator:

Get finder info flags creator and type. 

- (BOOL)finderInfoFlags:(UInt16*)flags type:(OSType*)type 
        creator:(OSType*)creator;
Parameters
flags

Contains finder flags on return.

type

Contains finder type on return.

creator

Contains creator on return.

Return Value

Return YES if successful, otherwise NO and the returned values are invalid.

Discussion

The bits of the finder info flag are

NameDescription
kIsOnDeskFiles and folders (System 6)
kColorFiles and folders
kIsSharedFiles only (Applications only)
If clear, the application needs to write to its resource fork, and therefore cannot be shared on a server
kHasNoINITsFiles only (Extensions/Control Panels only)
This file contains no INIT resource
kHasBeenInitedFiles only
Clear if the file contains desktop database resources ('BNDL', 'FREF', 'open', 'kind'...) that have not been added yet. Set only by the Finder
kHasCustomIconFiles and folders
kIsStationeryFiles only
kNameLockedFiles and folders
kHasBundleFiles only
kIsInvisibleFiles and folders
kIsAliasFiles only.

finderLocation

Return a finder items location. 

- (NSPoint)finderLocation;
Return Value

A NSPoint

Discussion

Returns a finder items location within its parent window.

getFSRef:

Get a FSRef. 

- (BOOL)getFSRef:(FSRef *)fsRef;
Parameters
fsRef

A pointer to a FSRef struct, to be filled by the method.

Return Value

Returns YES if successful, if the method returns NO then fsRef contains garbage.

Discussion

Obtain a FSRef for a file url.

getFSSpec:

Get a FSSpec.

Deprecated:

in version 10.5

- (BOOL)getFSSpec:(FSSpec *)fsSpec;
Parameters
fsSpec

A pointer to a FSSpec struct, to be filled by the method.

Return Value

Returns YES if successful, if the method returns NO then fsSpec contains garbage.

Discussion

Obtain a FSSpec for a file url.

Availability
Introduced in Mac OS X v10.2, and deprecated in Mac OS X v10.2.

resolveAliasFile

Resolve an alias file. 

- (NSURL *)resolveAliasFile;
Return Value

An file url NSURL.

Discussion

Returns an file url NSURL refered to by the receveive if the receveive refers to an alias file. If it does not refer to an alias file the a url identical to the receveive is returned.

setFinderInfoFlags:mask:type:creator:

Set finder info flags, creator and type. 

- (BOOL)setFinderInfoFlags:(UInt16)flags mask:(UInt16)aMask 
        type:(OSType)type creator:(OSType)creator;
Parameters
flags

Finder flags.

aMask

Mask for Finder flags

type

The Finder file type

creator

The application creator code

Return Value

Returns YES if successful.

Discussion

The bits of the finder info flag are

NameDescription
kIsOnDeskFiles and folders (System 6)
kColorFiles and folders
kIsSharedFiles only (Applications only)
If clear, the application needs to write to its resource fork, and therefore cannot be shared on a server
kHasNoINITsFiles only (Extensions/Control Panels only)
This file contains no INIT resource
kHasBeenInitedFiles only
Clear if the file contains desktop database resources ('BNDL', 'FREF', 'open', 'kind'...) that have not been added yet. Set only by the Finder
kHasCustomIconFiles and folders
kIsStationeryFiles only
kNameLockedFiles and folders
kHasBundleFiles only
kIsInvisibleFiles and folders
kIsAliasFiles only.

setFinderLocation:

Sets the location a finder item. 

- (BOOL)setFinderLocation:(NSPoint)location;
Parameters
location

The location

Return Value

Returns YES if successful.

Discussion

Set the location of a finder item within in container.

URLByDeletingLastPathComponent

Delete last component of a url. 

- (NSURL *)URLByDeletingLastPathComponent;
Return Value

A new NSURL

Discussion

Returns a new NSURL equivelent to the receiver with the last component removed.

URLWithFileSystemPathHFSStyle:

Alloc and intialize a NSURL. 

+ (NSURL *)URLWithFileSystemPathHFSStyle:(NSString *)hfsString;
Parameters
hfsString

A NSString containing a HFS style path.

Return Value

A NSURL containing a file url.

Discussion

Returns a file url for the file refered to by a HFS style path.

URLWithFSRef:

Alloc and intialize a NSURL. 

+ (NSURL *)URLWithFSRef:(const FSRef *)fsRef;
Parameters
fsRef

A pointer to a FSRef.

Return Value

A NSURL containing a file url.

Discussion

Returns a file url for the file refered to by a FSRef.
